welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dmitrov, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and beautiful natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time during your visit!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SVO Free WiFi' from the list of available networks and following the prompts.
